item.title: RAG-based Catalog System for ONDC
item.description: Built a retrieval-augmented generation system that understands complex product taxonomies and delivers instant, accurate results for e-commerce catalog management.

item.title: AI Research Agent for Medical ML
item.description: Created an intelligent agent that helps doctors and researchers automatically generate, test, and validate machine learning pipelines for their specific research needs.

item.title: The Bitter Lesson
item.description:
A foundational essay by Rich Sutton on why the most effective AI methods ultimately leverage computation and search rather than human-crafted knowledge.

Key Insights

The Core Thesis

“The biggest lesson that can be read from 70 years of AI research is that general methods that leverage computation are ultimately the most effective, and by a large margin.”
